sentences: Bartholomeus Ruloffs (October 1741 - 13 May 1801) was a Dutch conductor and composer.
Ruloffs was born and died in Amsterdam.
His duties as conductor included conducting the city's Felix Meritis concerts.

His new music for Zemire en Azor, a zangspel with scenery and ballets, for Pieter Pypers' 1784 Dutch version of the play by Jean-Fran√ßois Marmontel was a significant early step towards producing an opera in Dutch.
printed by J.J. Hummel in Amsterdam.
